item.title: GithubCourseCodeQLU Boot
item.description: GitHub Course CodeQL U-Boot Those are my solutions to GitHub Course CodeQL U-Boot, posting them here because I felt like they are going to be good as a cheat sheet. Solutions Get all function definitions with the name strlen import cpp from Function f where f.getName() = "strlen" select f, "a fucntion named strlen" Get all the macro definitions with a regex ntohs|ntohl|ntohll import cpp from Macro m where m.
